game.name: Pinball Spire
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 액션 어드벤처가 핀볼과 만나 이 독특한 핀볼배니아 어드벤처로 탄생했습니다. 정체불명의 탑이 허공에서 느닷없이 나타났습니다. 겁 모르는 핀볼 하나로 탑에 진입해 좌충우돌 부딪히고, 돌고, 쏘고, 뒤집으며 수수께끼를 풀어나가야 합니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Action adventure meets pinball in this one-of-a-kind pinballvania adventure. When a mysterious spire appears from thin air, it's up to an intrepid pinball to bump, spin, shoot, and flip its way to the top and solve the tower’s mysteries!

reviewHighlights.text: Frustratingly short for the price, with a side salad of zero replayability.
Best pinball game I've played since Yoku's Island Express.
